Requirements¶

The requirements necessary to use this Django Project Boilerplate are:

  • python3.12 and pip24

  • virtualenv and virtualenvwrapper

  • GNU gettext (to use Internationalization)

If you don’t have the first two requirements, you may find this post useful: Install Python 3 on Windows and use virtualenv and virtualenvwrapper.

Ready!? Continue to the Quick Start Guide!
